question: {name} goes to the store to buy some {item}. The normal brand of {item} he buys costs {cur}{price} per {unit}. He had to buy a more expensive brand that costs {percent}% more since his favorite brand was sold out. He decides to buy a week's worth of {item} and he uses {usage} {unit} of {item} per day. He also decided to buy himself a {extra_item} for {cur}{extra_price}. How much did everything cost?
